SwissCarMarket MVP - Car valuation platform for Switzerland

Features:

- Real-time progress indicator on success page
- Admin dashboard with status management
- Image upload to Supabase storage
- NextAuth authentication for admin
- Prisma with PostgreSQL database
- German UI with formal language
